column1: *''Vardo tellumar nu luini'' "beneath the blue vaults of [[Varda]]" (''[[Namárië]]'')

column2: Tolkien]] experimented with ''luine'' being a cognate of [[Sindarin]] ''[[duin]]'' ("river"), but noted that ''luine'' as meaning "river" was not used. [[Patrick H.
